description.zh-cn: 横跨欧亚两洲的共和国，继承自奥斯曼帝国，于1923年建立。现为联合国、北约等多个国际组织的成员。
description.en: A republic straddling Europe and Asia, successor to the Ottoman Empire, established in 1923. It is a member of several international organizations, including the UN and NATO.

nodes.id: 雷杰普·塔伊普·埃尔多安

zh-cn: 雷杰普·塔伊普·埃尔多安

description.zh-cn: 土耳其政治人物，现任土耳其总统。他推动了多项政策，包括更改国名、应对2016年未遂政变以及接收叙利亚难民。
description.en: A Turkish politician serving as the current President of Turkey. He has driven various policies, including the country's name change, the response to the 2016 coup attempt, and the acceptance of Syrian refugees.

description.zh-cn: 土耳其政治人物，现任土耳其副总统。
description.en: A Turkish politician, the current Vice President of Turkey.

description.zh-cn: 土耳其政治人物，现任土耳其大国民议会议长。
description.en: A Turkish politician, the current Speaker of the Grand National Assembly of Turkey.

description.zh-cn: 土耳其共和国的立法机构。于1922年废除奥斯曼苏丹国，并在2017年通过宪法修正案实行总统制。
description.en: The legislative body of the Republic of Turkey. It abolished the Ottoman Sultanate in 1922 and passed constitutional amendments in 2017 to implement a presidential system.

nodes.id: 穆斯塔法·凯末尔·阿塔图尔克

zh-cn: 穆斯塔法·凯末尔·阿塔图尔克

description.zh-cn: 土耳其共和国的国父和首任总统，领导土耳其国民运动和独立战争，并推行了一系列旨在建立世俗共和国的改革。
description.en: The founding father and first President of the Republic of Turkey. He led the Turkish National Movement and the War of Independence and implemented a series of reforms to establish a secular republic.

description.zh-cn: 土耳其共和国的前身，一个曾统治东南欧、西亚和北非大片领土的帝国。在第一次世界大战后解体。
description.en: The predecessor to the Republic of Turkey, an empire that controlled vast territories in Southeast Europe, Western Asia, and North Africa. It was dismantled after World War I.

description.zh-cn: 一份和平条约，该条约的签署使得国际社会承认新成立的土耳其共和国为奥斯曼帝国的合法继承国，并规定了希腊和土耳其的人口交换。
description.en: A peace treaty whose signing led to international recognition of the newly founded Republic of Turkey as the legal successor state of the Ottoman Empire and stipulated a population exchange between Greece and Turkey.

description.zh-cn: 由穆斯塔法·凯末尔领导的军事和政治运动，旨在反抗《色佛尔条约》的条款，并最终建立了土耳其共和国。
description.en: A military and political campaign led by Mustafa Kemal Atatürk to challenge the terms of the Treaty of Sèvres, ultimately leading to the establishment of the Republic of Turkey.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战后协约国与奥斯曼帝国签订的和平条约，旨在瓜分奥斯曼帝国，但其条款遭到土耳其国民运动的抵制。
description.en: A peace treaty signed between the Allied Powers and the Ottoman Empire after World War I, which aimed to partition the empire but was resisted by the Turkish National Movement.

description.zh-cn: 由穆斯塔法·凯末尔·阿塔图尔克推行的一系列激进改革，旨在将奥斯曼-土耳其国家转变为一个新的世俗共和国。
description.en: A series of radical reforms implemented by Mustafa Kemal Atatürk aimed at transforming the old Ottoman-Turkish state into a new, secular republic.

description.zh-cn: 一个旨在遏制苏联在地中海扩张的军事联盟，土耳其于1952年加入。
description.en: A military alliance aimed at curbing Soviet expansion in the Mediterranean, which Turkey joined in 1952.

description.zh-cn: 一个库尔德分离主义组织，自1984年以来一直针对土耳其政府发动叛乱，被土耳其视为恐怖组织。
description.en: A Kurdish separatist organization that has been waging an insurgency against the Turkish government since 1984 and is considered a terrorist organization by Turkey.

description.zh-cn: 由土耳其军方内部派系发动的一场未遂政变，企图推翻总统埃尔多安但以失败告终。
description.en: A failed coup d'état attempt by a faction within the Turkish Armed Forces to overthrow President Erdoğan.

description.zh-cn: 土耳其在美国从叙利亚库尔德地区撤军后发起的军事行动，旨在打击当地的库尔德民兵。
description.en: A military operation launched by Turkey after the U.S. withdrawal from Syrian Kurdish areas, aimed at targeting local Kurdish militias.

description.zh-cn: 土耳其人口最多的少数民族，与土耳其政府存在长期的矛盾和冲突。
description.en: The largest ethnic minority in Turkey, with a long history of conflict with the Turkish government.

description.zh-cn: 因叙利亚内战而流离失所的群体，土耳其是接收该群体最多的国家。
description.en: A group of people displaced by the Syrian Civil War, with Turkey being the largest host country.

nodes.id: 凯末尔·克勒奇达尔奥卢

zh-cn: 凯末尔·克勒奇达尔奥卢

description.zh-cn: 土耳其政治人物，曾任反对派领导人。在2023年土耳其大选中，他批评埃尔多安的难民政策，并承诺若当选将遣返所有难民。
description.en: A Turkish politician and former opposition leader. In the 2023 Turkish general election, he criticized Erdoğan's refugee policy and promised to repatriate all refugees if elected.

description.zh-cn: 欧亚国家。2015年，其一架战斗机被土耳其击落，导致两国关系一度交恶。
description.en: A Eurasian country. In 2015, one of its fighter jets was shot down by Turkey, leading to a period of strained relations between the two countries.

nodes.id: 2015年土耳其击落俄罗斯战斗机事件

zh-cn: 2015年土耳其击落俄罗斯战斗机事件

description.zh-cn: 土耳其军方击落一架俄罗斯战斗机的事件，导致土俄关系大幅恶化。
description.en: An incident where the Turkish military shot down a Russian fighter jet, causing a significant deterioration in Turkey-Russia relations.

description.zh-cn: 土耳其共和国的武装力量，由陆军、海军和空军组成。曾在2015年击落俄罗斯战斗机，并在2016年发生未遂政变。
description.en: The military forces of the Republic of Turkey, consisting of the Army, Navy, and Air Force. It was involved in the 2015 shootdown of a Russian fighter jet and experienced a failed coup attempt in 2016.

relationships.source: 穆斯塔法·凯末尔·阿塔图尔克

description.zh-cn: 穆斯塔法·凯末尔·阿塔图尔克领导了土耳其独立战争，并于1923年10月29日宣告成立土耳其共和国，成为其首任总统。
description.en: Mustafa Kemal Atatürk led the Turkish War of Independence and on October 29, 1923, proclaimed the Republic of Turkey, becoming its first president.

description.zh-cn: 《洛桑条约》的签署使新成立的土耳其共和国获得国际承认，确立了其作为奥斯曼帝国合法继承国的地位。
description.en: The signing of the Treaty of Lausanne granted international recognition to the newly established Republic of Turkey, confirming its status as the legal successor to the Ottoman Empire.

description.zh-cn: 土耳其大国民议会正式废除苏丹国，终结了奥斯曼帝国623年的君主统治。
description.en: The Grand National Assembly of Turkey officially abolished the Sultanate, ending 623 years of monarchical rule by the Ottoman Empire.

description.zh-cn: 土耳其独立战争旨在挑战和反抗旨在瓜分奥斯曼帝国的《色佛尔条约》条款。
description.en: The Turkish War of Independence was aimed at challenging and resisting the terms of the Treaty of Sèvres, which sought to partition the Ottoman Empire.

relationships.source: 穆斯塔法·凯末尔·阿塔图尔克

description.zh-cn: 作为首任总统，穆斯塔法·凯末尔·阿塔图尔克推行了一系列激进的凯末尔改革，旨在建立一个现代化的世俗共和国。
description.en: As the first president, Mustafa Kemal Atatürk implemented a series of radical reforms, known as Atatürk's Reforms, to create a modern, secular republic.

description.zh-cn: 为遏制苏联在地中海的扩张，土耳其于1952年加入北大西洋公约组织。
description.en: To curb Soviet expansion in the Mediterranean, Turkey joined the North Atlantic Treaty Organization in 1952.

relationships.source: 雷杰普·塔伊普·埃尔多安

description.zh-cn: 雷杰普·塔伊普·埃尔多安是土耳其共和国的现任总统。
description.en: Recep Tayyip Erdoğan is the current President of the Republic of Turkey.

relationships.target: 雷杰普·塔伊普·埃尔多安

description.zh-cn: 杰夫代特·耶尔马兹担任土耳其副总统，是总统埃尔多安的下属。
description.en: Cevdet Yılmaz serves as the Vice President of Turkey, subordinate to President Erdoğan.

description.zh-cn: 努曼·库尔图尔穆什担任土耳其大国民议会议长。
description.en: Numan Kurtulmuş serves as the Speaker of the Grand National Assembly of Turkey.

description.zh-cn: 自1984年起，库尔德工人党开始针对土耳其政府发动叛乱，至今已造成超过4万人死亡。
description.en: Since 1984, the Kurdistan Workers' Party (PKK) has been waging an insurgency against the Turkish government, resulting in over 40,000 deaths.

relationships.target: 雷杰普·塔伊普·埃尔多安

description.zh-cn: 2016年7月15日，土耳其军方部分派系发动政变，企图推翻总统埃尔多安，但最终失败。
description.en: On July 15, 2016, a faction within the Turkish military launched a coup attempt to overthrow President Erdoğan, which ultimately failed.

description.zh-cn: 2019年10月，土耳其宣布进行“和平之泉”军事行动，以打击叙利亚当地的库尔德民兵。
description.en: In October 2019, Turkey announced Operation Peace Spring to target Kurdish militias in Syria.

description.zh-cn: “和平之泉”军事行动旨在打击土耳其视为威胁的叙利亚库尔德民兵组织。
description.en: Operation Peace Spring was aimed at combating Syrian Kurdish militia groups, which Turkey considers a threat.

relationships.source: 雷杰普·塔伊普·埃尔多安

description.zh-cn: 埃尔多安政府采取积极接收叙利亚内战难民的政策，使土耳其成为全球最大的难民接收国。
description.en: The Erdoğan government has actively pursued a policy of accepting refugees from the Syrian Civil War, making Turkey the world's largest refugee-hosting country.

relationships.source: 凯末尔·克勒奇达尔奥卢

description.zh-cn: 在2023年土耳其大选中，时任反对派领导人凯末尔·克勒奇达尔奥卢承诺，一旦当选总统将遣返所有难民。
description.en: During the 2023 Turkish general election, then-opposition leader Kemal Kılıçdaroğlu pledged to repatriate all refugees if elected president.

relationships.source: 凯末尔·克勒奇达尔奥卢
relationships.target: 雷杰普·塔伊普·埃尔多安

description.zh-cn: 凯末尔·克勒奇达尔奥卢是2023年土耳其大选中雷杰普·塔伊普·埃尔多安的主要政治对手。
description.en: Kemal Kılıçdaroğlu was the main political rival of Recep Tayyip Erdoğan in the 2023 Turkish general election.

relationships.target: 2015年土耳其击落俄罗斯战斗机事件

description.zh-cn: 2015年11月24日，土耳其军方击落了一架俄罗斯战斗机。
description.en: On November 24, 2015, the Turkish military shot down a Russian fighter jet.

relationships.source: 2015年土耳其击落俄罗斯战斗机事件

description.zh-cn: 该事件导致俄罗斯一架战斗机被摧毁，并引发了土耳其与俄罗斯之间的外交危机。
description.en: The incident resulted in the destruction of a Russian fighter jet and sparked a diplomatic crisis between Turkey and Russia.
